bills.title: Resolution supporting recreation uses on Flathead Lake
Provide that only contested precinct committee men/women need to be on the primary election ballot
Revise state procurement laws related to entitles that are exempt from the RFP process.
Revise laws for payroll deduction of union dues and political contributions by public employers
Providing medicaid expansion to able-bodied adults who comply with community engagement requirements
Limit the state's ability to bank statewide mills
Extend legislative immunity to legislative staff
Revise central committees notification process laws
Provide for a hospital community benefit fee
